per_question.question: Summarize Alan Estes' professional profile from the provided document.
per_question.answer: Alan Estes is an experienced professional with a strong background in Psychology and expertise in Java, CI/CD, and Data Analysis. He has a proven track record of delivering high-quality results in fast-paced environments and possesses excellent critical thinking and leadership skills. Alan has held roles including Business Analyst at Valentine LLC (2021-2024), DevOps Engineer at Phelps-Larsen (2016-2019), and Full Stack Developer at Ellis-Morales (2008-Present). His technical skills include Java, CI/CD, Data Analysis, Git, Azure, C++, React, and Node.js. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Engineering from Williams, Osborne and Booth University with a GPA of 3.4 (2020). Alan is also noted for his problem solving, communication, and time management abilities.
